title: Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) between Sri Lanka and Bangladesh on Collaboration in the Field of Higher Education
decision_details: - The proposal made by Hon. Lakshman Kiriella, the Minister of Higher Education and Highways, to sign a MoU between the University Grants Commission of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka and the University Grants Commission of the Republic of Bangladesh during the forthcoming State Visit of H.E. the President, with a view to strengthening and broadening of the collaboration in the field of higher education in both countries, was approved by the Cabinet.
